mapper.select: SELECT id, category_id AS categoryId, title, item_type AS itemType, sell_point AS sellPoint, price, num, barcode AS barCode, image, status, priority, created_user AS createdUser, created_time AS createdTime, modified_user AS modifiedUser, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM t_goods WHERE category_id=#{categoryId} AND status=1 AND num>0 ORDER BY ${orderBy} LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_goods WHERE category_id=#{categoryId}
